project.Title: Shadow Walker (Class Mod)
project.ItemDescription:
V2.7
[h1]August 2019 Update[/h1] *NEW Russian Translation by HjordisTBM *Compatible with [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1779509342][b]Pets (Trinkets + Monster Mod)[/b][/url] Details below.
[h1]Class Description[/h1] The Shadow Walker is an agile ninja and treasure hunter, with mysterious connections to the black market. His contact pays him a nice bonus for fine jade and unique antiques. The Shadow Walker eventually hand-crafted a travel case to store additional gemstones (9 jade stones and 2 trapazohedrons). In addition, his keen eyes can often spot loot others would miss.
He can attack with his katanna, venomous shurikens, or entangle opponents with a chain. He can also slap or pinch enemies. He can slide into the shadows and tries to attain a healing meditative state. He usually carries two small, glass globes that are Smoke Bombs which can reveal stealthy monsters. His treasure hunting skills and black market connections make him a valuable companion.
[img]https://i.imgur.com/yjCMDFG.png[/img]
[h1]Combat Skills[/h1] Ken-Jutsu (Katana Strike) Kiai-Jutsu (Chain Entangle) Kuji-Kiri (Gesture Slap) Venom Tipped Shurikens Blood Boil Pressure Point Shadow Slide
Some of his skills grow in reach, duration, or starting location with practice.
[h1]Camping Skills[/h1] Dark Meditation Sabotage Assassination Guerilla Warfare
[h1]Pets Compatible[/h1] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1779509342][img]https://i.imgur.com/Cb2vcbh.jpg[/img][/url] NOW LIVE! Help free "Sting", the Shadow Walker's Pet Spider who was captured by the Pet Patrol in the [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1779509342][b]Pets (Trinkets + Monster Mod)[/b][/url]. Optional mod.
[h1]Herbs of the Wild Compatible[/h1] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1390782905&searchtext=herbs+of+the+wild][img]https://i.imgur.com/Lhn3Whb.jpg[/img][/url] A Shadow Walker has extensive training as an herbalist: the study of botany and plants for medicinal and other uses. This allow a Shadow Walker to take full advantage of Carnifex's [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1390782905&searchtext=herbs+of+the+wild][b]Herbs of the Wild Resource Mod[/b][/url] which is recommended (and fun!) but is NOT required. It's especially helpful if you use Shadow Walker as your item collector. NOTE: When loading mods, just place HotW Resource Mod ABOVE/ON TOP OF all participating Class Mods. [spoiler]Slim chance to find Herbal Trinkets in any of the four core areas.[/spoiler]
[h1]A Spider Hunter[/h1] A Shadow Walker is skilled with pressure points and can help kill Spiders found in the [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1717651804][b]Spider Nests 2 (Monster Mod)[/b][/url]. The Camping Skill "Assasination" grants him a 22% damage versus spiders for 4 battles. Incidentally, the Shadow Walker has been searching for his lost Pet Spider "Sting." Optional mod. [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1717651804][img]https://i.imgur.com/A1uo7iU.jpg[/img][/url]
[h1]Trinkets[/h1] Vial of Good Memories Book of Poems Heavy Chain Dark Incense Assassination Contract Elio's Last Boots, Set Elio's Last Gloves, Set "Constant Craving" Katanna, COM Master's Mask, CC Set Master's Razor Bracers, CC Set Elio's Head, Collector Shadow Walker's Ring Blessed Chain
[h1]Roles[/h1] Stealth, Shuffler, Blight, Treasure Hunter, Marking, Stunner
[h1]Other[/h1] Custom supply item (Smoke Bomb) Custom sounds 6 Color/Character Variations (A-F) Town Event Treasure Hunter Bonus: Hunts for unique item (Jade Chess Piece), slim chance at other loot too. Custom Gem Inventory Stack Limit (Jade/9 : Trapezohedron/2) New Quirks +Skilled Toxicologist -Toxic Hypersensitivity
[h1]Compatability[/h1] Color of Madness Yes Crimson Court Yes [note: Should work okay without DLCs, since the trinkets are segregated]
[h1]Languages[/h1] English, Chinese(S), Russian Other languages show English strings
[h1]Playstyle[/h1] Shadow Walker can work with a variety of playstyles and other class configurations and gains extra loot for town and hero upgrades. He is not a huge damage dealer but can also stun, blight, and has a unique riposte. He works well with Graverobbers and teams that continually reposition. Nimble. Random stealth. Critical hits trigger a short Riposte. Rare meditative state group healing. His treasure hunting income can be a huge help.
